I can definitely say if I had power make second part we all find out he is a hybrid and his blood is actually of a god of all gods and when gets enraged he becomes a different person and he slaughters every orc but first ties them up and fucks all their wives and daughters and then he kills all their sons and makes their ex wives and daughter kill
Them and the last sight they see is his smile and saying thank you for awakening the blood of gods and then he fucks his wife with bigger dick than them but he keeps the guy who stole her alive so he slowly dies while seeing all his guys die and all the women only like him and bear his child and he takes back his wife and he dies slowly painful emotional heart wrenching death
This guy was a beta he never satisfied her so he never deserved her.This was some good shit.

If she's so strong, she could have just gone up to the ogre holding her husband, pretending she's gonna suck his dick then kill him up close before he could hurt her husband.  Husband then runs and she proceeds to freely slaughter them all.

Kinda wholesome ending: the husband's sperm wins

Less wholesome ending: the husband's sperm wins, but she leaves him for the ogres
this is why you don't ever pick a Normal Villager as a Husband, What a Dumb Bitch
